about_the_game:
About This Game 🌟🍰



As an Earthling cat chef, you’ll set out on a whimsical journey from the quaint town of Whiskerton to the mysterious settlement of Purrgatory, all while aboard the magnificent Starlight Haven mothership. Your mission? To create mouthwatering desserts using a vast array of unique ingredients, sourced from diverse landscapes across both Earth and the cosmos. Each dish you craft will satisfy the whimsical cravings of cats from every corner of the universe. 😺🍩

A Universe Of Exploration and Connection 🌌✨


‘Meow Cafe’ isn’t just about cooking—it’s an expansive world brimming with exploration, connection, and heartwarming stories. Manage your very own intergalactic cafe while meeting a captivating cast of characters, each with their own secrets and tales to share. Delve into the universe’s culinary mysteries as you uncover hidden recipes and solve cosmic puzzles that are integral to your success. 🔍🧩

Cosmic Confections and Galactic Ingredients 🪐🍮


Beyond the kitchen, adventure awaits in the vast reaches of space. Venture to distant planets and uncharted territories to gather rare and exotic ingredients essential for crafting the galaxy’s most sought-after desserts. Each new planet offers its own unique challenges, from navigating treacherous terrains to bargaining with alien traders—all in pursuit of culinary perfection. 🌠🍰

A Cozy, Immersive Experience ☕🎨


Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of ‘Meow Cafe,’ where every moment is designed to delight. From the charming ambiance of your cafe to the endearing personalities of your customers, the game offers a rich, narrative-driven experience that will captivate your senses. Whether you’re crafting a new dessert or forging friendships with your interstellar patrons, every interaction adds depth to your culinary journey. 🐾❤️

Join the Adventure 🎮🚀



Prepare to be charmed by the cozy atmosphere, delightful characters, and endless culinary possibilities that await you in ‘Meow Cafe.’ This is more than just a game—it’s a magical journey that will leave a lasting impression, offering an unforgettable adventure full of exploration, creativity, and heart. 🌟😻

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX760 | AMD Radeon 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to install on an SSD.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K | AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to install on an SSD.

short_description: Embark on a cosmic culinary adventure! As a cat chef, travel from Whiskerton to Purrgatory aboard the Starlight Haven. Craft desserts, explore new worlds for rare ingredients, and manage an intergalactic cafe filled with charming characters and heartwarming stories.
